title: the honor system is terrible
body:
I got a 2week ban over 5 months ago for telling someone I found their mom's tinder profile and "she gross", it took me over an entire month to get back to being "honorable" and to this day I was only able to get to honor level 1 after over five months of playing the game without getting any bans or reports.. lol

today, the last day of ranked gameplay I just got a 10 game chat restriction for calling my evelynn "garbage can", i lost access to rewards and i am honor level 0 again

so i guess i have to wait another five months to get back where I was, because this company is completely and utterly dogshit and the proof of that is the current meta

replies.body:
No, your attitude is what is "utterly dogshit".

Maybe if you'd actually started to behave after your ban you'd have gained honor more quickly.

I refused to use chat at all and it still took 2 weeks/checkpoint.

Just saying. Came back and now I just don't care. Riot can permaban me, I one trick and the account really means nothing to me.
Why would people choose to honor you if you're not using chat at all, when they could honor someone who *did* use chat and held the team together?

support/adc just auto-trade honors unless one is really terrible.

I got enough honors just from playing.

Interesting, in all of my recent games where I've played bot lane roles, I don't see this at all.

Also, I like how you assume you know what the "average" would be to know you got "enough".
I'd say one honor in 2/3 of games is enough, wouldn't you?
There's multiple players, including myself, that average over 1 honor per game (again, average, so obviously some games have none, some have 3 or 4).
so? 1 from a non-party member is still enough.
if you're averaging less than 1 per game when there's multiple players averaging 1 or even 2 per game, you shouldn't expect to climb as fast as them.
I disagree that most people are averaging more than 1 per game, that's just all there is to it.
Because some people disregard the person that uses chat positively, and honors the one that made the best plays.

Your attitude is what led you here and into a ban.
you managed to get banned again, even AFTER YOUR 14 DAY BAN.

Meta has nothing to do with toxicity, Inting sion is working even if he is feeding his ass off.
You were toxic. You got exactly what you deserve. And you definitely don't deserve any end of the season rewards.

this community is doomed if you all think it's deserving to have a month of gameplay required to get rewards for calling someone a "garbage can"; enjoy getting offended last time i use these forums rofl
Hopefully the last time you play the game too.
